author: Clare Morrow
description: Chartreuse herbal complexity and richness are soured by lemon and invigorated by brut sparkling wine/champagne in this riff on a French 75.
name: French 1605
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)
90 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
